name: Online Job Portal
tagline: Online Job Portal project is web application built using PHP HTML JavaScript & Bootstrap.
body:
## Welcome to Online Job Portal Project.
Online Job Portal project is web application built using PHP, MySql as backend and HTML JavaScript & Bootstrap as Frontend.

### Web Learners Project!
We’ve crafted this software as a Mini Project for partial requirement of B.Tech Degree in Computer Science.
+ This is not a production ready software
+ We have uploaded and maintained this project for similar academic needs and to help beginners in php
+ The php programs are wriiten using basic concepts, that anyone can understand.

### Technologies required/used:
+ HTML 5, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX.
+ Bootstrap 3 (http://getbootstrap.com/) as the CSS Framework.
+ Mysql 5.6 (or higher) as the Database
+ Php 5.7 or higher is required
+ LAMP Server stack (can be used with WAMP or alternate stack)
+ PhpStorm as the IDE
+ All made possible using our favourite OS @Ubuntu (www.ubuntu.com)

***

### Improve and Maintain
If you love this project fix bugs or add missing features or rewrite certain components.
+ Star this project for quick access and if you like this project, than forking this project.
+ Contibutions are always welcomed.

***

## Authors and Contributors

### Support or Contact
